trans-unit.source: Contains functionality common to row header cells and column header cells.
trans-unit.target: Contém a funcionalidade comum de células de cabeçalho de linha e as células de cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: This class is a base class for other header cell classes, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é uma classe base para outras classes de célula de cabeçalho, como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: To create custom row header icons or column header glyphs, inherit from the DataGridViewHeaderCell class and add functionality to paint your own icon or glyph.
trans-unit.target: Para criar ícones de cabeçalho de linha personalizado ou glifos de cabeçalho de coluna, herdam da classe DataGridViewHeaderCell e adiciona a funcionalidade para pintar o seu próprio ícone ou glifo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the buttonlike visual state of the header cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado visual buttonlike da célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> is like a button in that it can be clicked to set states, such as sorting or performing row-level selection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>é como um botão em que ele pode ser clicado para definir os estados, como classificação ou executar a seleção do nível de linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: The ButtonState property uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState?displayProperty=fullName> values to provide buttonlike visual states.
trans-unit.target: Os usos de propriedade ButtonState <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState?displayProperty=fullName>valores para fornecer estados visuais buttonlike.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref> values; the default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"> </xref> valores; o padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta célula.

trans-unit.source: Override the Clone method whenever you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> and add new properties to the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o método Clone sempre que derivam <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>e adicionar novas propriedades à classe derivada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the cell is currently displayed on-screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula está sendo exibida na tela.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is on-screen or partially on-screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula estiver na tela ou parcialmente na tela; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the formatted value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do valor formatado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property is the actual data object contained by the cell, whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property is the formatted representation of the data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>propriedade é o objeto de dados reais contido na célula, enquanto o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A>propriedade é a representação de formatação dos dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ValueType%2A> and FormattedValueType properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ValueType%2A>e FormattedValueType propriedades correspondem aos tipos de dados desses valores, respectivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ValueType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>objeto representando o <xref:System.String>tipo.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is frozen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula está congelada.

trans-unit.source: The Frozen property is `true` if the cell belongs to a frozen row or column, or if the cell is the top-left header cell.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade congelada é `true` se a célula pertence a uma linha congelada ou coluna, ou se a célula é a célula do cabeçalho esquerda superior.

trans-unit.source: A cell, row, or column is frozen when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A> property has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName>
trans-unit.target: Uma célula, linha ou coluna está congelada quando seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>propriedade tem um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is frozen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula está congelada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell is detached from a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a célula é desanexada de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the shortcut menu of the header cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o menu de atalho da célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> does not have a shortcut menu, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> will inherit the shortcut menu from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>não tem um menu de atalho, que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>herdam o menu de atalho do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> also does not have a shortcut menu, then the GetInheritedContextMenuStrip method will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>também não tem um menu de atalho, em seguida, o método GetInheritedContextMenuStrip retornará `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Ignored by this implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ignorado por esta implementação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> has a shortcut menu assigned; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> tem um menu de atalho atribuído; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating the current state of the cell as inherited from the state of its row or column.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica o estado atual da célula como herdadas do estado de linha ou coluna.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell or -1 if the cell is not a row header cell or is not contained within a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula ou -1 se a célula não é uma célula de cabeçalho de linha ou não está contida em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values representing the current state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que representam o estado atual da célula.

trans-unit.source: The cell is a column header cell or the control's and rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: A célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna ou o controle e rowIndex não é -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho da célula.

trans-unit.source: The GetSize method returns the size necessary to fit in a row of column headers if the header cell is a column header, the size necessary to fit in a column of row headers if the header cell is a row header, or the size necessary to be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> if the cell is a top left header cell.
trans-unit.target: O método GetSize retorna o tamanho necessário para se ajustar em uma linha de cabeçalhos de coluna, se a célula de cabeçalho é um cabeçalho de coluna, o tamanho necessário para se ajustar em uma coluna de cabeçalhos de linha, se a célula de cabeçalho é um cabeçalho de linha ou o tamanho necessário para ser um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>se a célula é uma célula do cabeçalho esquerda superior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: If the cell is not attached to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Size%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> returns the value (-1,-1).
trans-unit.target: Se a célula não está anexada a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Size%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell>retorna o valor (-1, -1).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The row index of the header cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the header cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho da célula de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property for this cell is and rowIndex does not equal -1. -or- The value of the property for this cell is not and rowIndex does not equal -1.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <> *> é de propriedade dessa célula e rowIndex não é igual a -1. o valor de - ou - o <> *> propriedade dessa célula não é e rowIndex não é igual a -1.

trans-unit.source: -or- The value of the property for this cell is not and rowIndex is less than zero or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the control. -or- The values of the and properties of this cell are both and rowIndex does not equal -1.
trans-unit.target: o valor de - ou - o <> *> propriedade dessa célula não é e rowIndex é menor que zero ou maior que ou igual ao número de linhas no controle. - ou - os valores da <> *> e Propriedades dessa célula são ambos e rowIndex não é igual a -1.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property for this cell is not and rowIndex indicates a row other than the .
trans-unit.target: O valor da <> *> propriedade dessa célula não é e rowIndex indica uma linha diferente de <> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha pai da célula.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexnão é -1.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse button is held down while the pointer is on a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha ser descompartilhada quando o botão do mouse é pressionado enquanto o ponteiro está em uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling visual styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como habilitar estilos visuais, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MouseDownUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseDownUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ele deverá retornar `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user clicks with the left mouse button, visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o usuário clica com o botão esquerdo do mouse, estilos visuais estiverem habilitados e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse pointer moves over a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha ser descompartilhada quando o ponteiro do mouse se move sobre uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling visual styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como habilitar estilos visuais, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MouseEnterUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseEnterUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseEnter%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ele deverá retornar `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that the mouse pointer entered.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que inseriu o ponteiro do mouse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se esses estilos estejam habilitados e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse pointer leaves the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha ser descompartilhada quando o ponteiro do mouse sai da linha.

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling visual styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como habilitar estilos visuais, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseLeaveUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseLeave%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ele deverá retornar `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that the mouse pointer left.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que o ponteiro do mouse à esquerda.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState*> property value is not <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"></xref>, visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState*>o valor da propriedade não é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState"> </xref>, estilos visuais estiverem habilitados e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a row will be unshared when the mouse button is released while the pointer is on a cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma linha ser descompartilhada quando o botão do mouse é liberado enquanto o ponteiro está em uma célula na linha.

trans-unit.source: For information about enabling visual styles, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como habilitar estilos visuais, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: MouseUpUnsharesRow is called just before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>.
trans-unit.target: MouseUpUnsharesRow é chamado antes de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It must return `true` if the call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A> has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve retornar `true` se a chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>tem o efeito de descompartilhar a linha `rowIndex`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.OnMouseUp%2A>

trans-unit.source: It should return `false` otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ele deverá retornar `false` caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o compartilhamento de linha, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the left mouse button was released, visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o botão esquerdo foi liberado, estilos visuais estiverem habilitados e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse button is held down while the pointer is on a cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o botão do mouse é pressionado enquanto o ponteiro está em uma célula.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseDown method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> if the cell is clicked with the left mouse button and visual styles are enabled for headers.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método OnMouseDown o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState>se a célula é clicada com o botão esquerdo do mouse e estilos visuais são habilitados para cabeçalhos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about visual styles for headers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre estilos visuais para cabeçalhos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é semelhante de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseDown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: As mesmas circunstâncias em que ele é chamado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado, mas ele não gera o evento realmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse pointer enters the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o ponteiro do mouse entra na célula.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseEnter method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> if the left mouse button is pressed when the pointer enters the cell and visual styles are enabled for headers.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método OnMouseEnter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState>se o botão esquerdo do mouse é pressionado quando o ponteiro entra na célula e estilos visuais são habilitados para cabeçalhos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about visual styles for headers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre estilos visuais para cabeçalhos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é semelhante de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseEnter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: As mesmas circunstâncias em que ele é chamado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado, mas ele não gera o evento realmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse pointer leaves the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o ponteiro do mouse sai da célula.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseLeave method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> if it was in another state and visual styles are enabled for headers.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método OnMouseLeave o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState>se ele estava em estado de outro e estilos visuais são habilitados para cabeçalhos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about visual styles for headers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre estilos visuais para cabeçalhos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é semelhante de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseLeave%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: As mesmas circunstâncias em que ele é chamado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado, mas ele não gera o evento realmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse button is released while the pointer is over the cell.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o botão do mouse é liberado enquanto o ponteiro está sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseUp method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> if the left mouse button was released and visual styles are enabled for headers.
trans-unit.target: Os conjuntos de método OnMouseUp o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState>se o botão esquerdo foi liberado e estilos visuais são habilitados para cabeçalhos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell.ButtonState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about visual styles for headers, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre estilos visuais para cabeçalhos, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EnableHeadersVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é semelhante de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.OnCellMouseUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It is called in the same circumstances in which a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.
trans-unit.target: As mesmas circunstâncias em que ele é chamado um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado, mas ele não gera o evento realmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the mouse position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pinta atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usado para pintar a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém os limites da célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que especifica o estado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados da célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados formatados da célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de erro que é associada à célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que contém informações de formatação e estilo sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que contém estilos de borda para a célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valores que especifica quais partes da célula precisam ser pintadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the header cell is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula de cabeçalho é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: An operation tries to set this property.
trans-unit.target: Uma operação tenta definir essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell is resizable.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula é redimensionável.

trans-unit.source: A row header cell is resizable if the row is resizable or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode>.
trans-unit.target: Uma célula de cabeçalho de linha pode ser redimensionada se a linha é redimensionável ou a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A column header cell is resizable if the column is resizable or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>.
trans-unit.target: Uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna é redimensionável se a coluna é redimensionável ou a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this cell can be resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se essa célula pode ser redimensionada; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell is not attached to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a célula não está anexada a um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell is selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a célula estiver selecionada.

trans-unit.source: This property is not meaningful for header cells.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é significativa para células de cabeçalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This property is being set.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade está sendo definida.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that describes the current object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the value stored in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo do valor armazenado na célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object representing the <xref:System.String> type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>objeto representando o <xref:System.String>tipo.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether or not the cell is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a célula estiver visível ou não.

trans-unit.source: If the cell is a row header cell, then it is visible if its row is visible and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de linha, ela é visível se a linha estiver visível e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell is a column header cell, then it is visible if its column is visible and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula é uma célula de cabeçalho de coluna, é visível se uma coluna está visível e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the cell is the top left header cell, it is visible if both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> are true.
trans-unit.target: Se a célula a célula do cabeçalho esquerda superior é visível se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>forem verdadeiras.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersVisible%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cell is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a célula estiver visível; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the cell is detached from a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se a célula é desanexada de um<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>
